**Solution**:

The average score of 20 students is 40. Hence, the total score of the 20 students is $20 \times 40 = 800$.
The average score of 21 students is 41. Hence, the total score of the 21 students is $\21 \times 41 = 861.$
Hence, the midterm score of the 21st student is $861 - 800 = 61$.
